title: We proved this doesn't work... - ROG Phone 7 Ultimate
description: Visit Newegg at   Bell is a GAMER, so when ASUS sent over their new ROG Phone 7 and 7 Ultimate, he was pumped to see if it'd take his gaming to the next level. With Air Triggers, an Active Cooler, and a port that actually opens up to dissipate heat, is this the ultimate package or should you just stick with your regular "pro" phone?  Want us to unbox something? Make a suggestion at   Buy an ASUS ROG Phone 7 Ultimate:   Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.   GET MERCH:   LTX 2023 TICKETS AVAILABLE NOW:   GET EXCLUSIVE CONTENT ON FLOATPLANE:   SPONSORS, AFFILIATES, AND PARTNERS:   PRODUCTS WE USE ON THE SHORTCIRCUIT SET:   FOLLOW US ELSEWHERE ---------------------------------------------------   Twitter:  Instagram:  TikTok:  Facebook:   CHAPTERS --------------------------------------------------- 0:00 Bell is a gamer 0:30 Unboxing the ROG Phone 7 Ultimate 1:57 Design impressions and ports 5:38 Unboxing the ROG Phone 7 and design impressions 6:58 Sponsor - Newegg 7:29 Bell was wrong 7:53 Software and specs 9:56 Speaker/Screen impressions 11:00 Camera testing 13:20 Gaming impressions and Labs' results 15:15 Trying out the Aero Active Cooler 17:05 Pricing and overall thoughts 17:47 Outro
